DOC.brief_summary: The primary hypothesis is that Lactobacillus paracasei ssp. paracasei strain F19 in an infant formula containing FOS/GOS is safe and tolerable for use in infants from 0 to 6 months.
DOC.brief_title: Supplementation of Infant Formula With Synbiotics
DOC.criteria: healthy infants of mothers who voluntarily resigned completely from breastfeeding infant age 28 days delivered between 38 and 42 weeks of gestation vaginal delivery birth weight > 2700 g and < 4200 g parent or the subject's legal representative has to speak and understand Polish fully or partially breastfed infants malformations, handicaps or congenital diseases that could affect normal growth treatment with antibiotics fed infant formula with pre and/or probiotics
